artist: Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: François Buisson
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: Folded sheet from fashion periodical (P.15,499); woman at left holds a fan and wears a white and purple gown with a hat with a blue ribbon and bouquet of flowers; at right are three shoes and two disembodied legs with thigh-high stockings with shoes
portfolio: From Journal de la Mode et du Goût, ou amusemens du salon et de la toilette, Paris, 1790–92
title: Fashion plate from Journal de la Mode et du Goût, Treizième Cahier, 25 Juin 1790
